title: Breathtaking Five-Star Retreat Overlooking the Tibetan Mountains
description: Discover traditional Tibetan culture and hospitality with a luxurious escape to the five-star InterContinental Lhasa Paradise, an IHG Hotel. This breathtaking haven replicates the stunning mountain ridges that surround the charming city of Lhasa, with four white peaks offering views of it all. Perfect for the adventurous traveller looking to explore the vast history of Tibet, the hotel offers a space for optimal relaxation after busy days exploring Lhasa's palaces, temples and natural wonders.
location_description: InterContinental Lhasa Paradise, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 Jiangsu Avenue, Lhasa 850000, Tibet Province, China
